MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Willowbrae Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 11:49AM. Our engineers are on their way to Lilyhill Terrace substation to investigate and repair a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:10PM on 12 December 2020.
